title: Charming One Bedroom Cottage Apartment with Washer/Dryer & Vaulted Ceilings!
posting_body: Our Calistoga floor plan is a one bed and one bath apartment that has 824 sqft of living space.
It is our Cottage style apartment so no one is above or below you.
The Calistoga floor plan has two patios one in front and back to relax and enjoy the weather, a walk-in closet and just a place you can call home.
At Vineyard Terrace, enjoy a swim in the sparkling pool or work out in a state-of-the-art fitness center.
State of the Art Fitness Center • Sparkling Pool • Available 24/7 to Assist You •
Door to Door Refuse and Recycling Service • Large, Private Dog Park
Central Heat and Air • Vaulted Ceilings • Front and Back Patios • Stackable Washer and Dryer • Two-Tone Paint • Ceiling Fan
Pets - Max 2 allowed Cats -  allowed, Rent $45.00, Deposit $500.00 Dogs -  allowed, Rent $45.00, Deposit $500.00
A deposit and rent charge is required for each pet.
Federal law prohibits housing discrimination on the basis of race, color, national origin, religion, sex, familial status, or disability.
* Prices and availability are subject to change without notice.
